Posts.Content: Thanks,     She has had her first treatment, and is doing great! her attidude is very positive as well. I don't know the type of BC it is ie herceptin neg or positive.
Posts.Title: Sister in law with BC :(

Posts.Content: Hi all, My I am usually at the brain tumor section (hubby) We just found out his sister has BC, and has some spots on bones and some lymph involement, she is 39 and her mom passed away from breast cancer....this is almost to much for our family....how is treatment once it has spread? Just need some info....thanks and take care. Kristalee
